title: ACCOUNTING
de_requirements: A' Level/IJMB with 9 points from Economics and any other two subjects from Business Management, Accounts, Government. ND with minimum of upper credit in Accountancy
utme_requirements: Five (5) credits in English Language, Mathematics, Economics and any other two (2) subjects from Government, Commerce, Accounting, Geography
subjects: English Language, Mathematics, Economics Principles of Account and any other subject from Commerce, Marketing, Government and Geography

title: AEROSPACE ENGINEERING
de_requirements:
IJMB – 13 points with a minimum of ‘B’ in Mathematics and Physics.
ND with Upper Credit in Aircraft Engineering Technology.
utme_requirements: Five (5) credits in English Language, Mathematics, Physic, Chemistry and any other science subject from Additional Mathematics/Further Mathematics, Tech Drawing, Biology, Geography, Basic Electricity/Basic Electronics and Agricultural Science
subjects: English Language, Mathematics, Physic and Chemistry

title: AUTOMOTIVE ENGINEERING
de_requirements:
A' Level/IJMB with 9 points from Mathematics, Physics and Chemistry. 
ND with Upper Credit in Mechanical Engineering Technology.
utme_requirements: Five (5) credits in English, Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry and any other subject from Additional Mathematics/Further Mathematics, Tech Drawing, Biology, Geography, Basic Electricity/Basic Electronics and Agricultural Science
subjects: English Language Mathematics, Physics and Chemistry

title: BANKING & FINANCE
de_requirements: A' Level/IJMB with 9 points from Economics and any other two subjects from Business Management, Accounts, Government. ND with Upper Credit in Banking and Finance.
utme_requirements: Five (5) credits in English Language, Mathematics, Economics and any other two (2) subjects from Government, Commerce, Accounting, Geography
subjects: English Language, Mathematics, Economics Principles of Account and any other subject from Commerce, Marketing, Government and Geography

title: BUSINESS ADMINISTRATION
de_requirements:
ND with Upper Credit in Business Administration and Management, Accounting, Banking and Finance, Cooperative Economics and Management and Marketing.

A' Level/IJMB with 9 points from Economics and any other two subjects from Business Management
utme_requirements: Five (5) credits in English Language, Mathematics, Economics and any other subject from Government, Commerce, Accounting, Book-Keeping, Book Method, Marketing, Geography, Office Technology and Civic Education.
subjects: English Language, Mathematics, Economics and any other subject from Commerce, Geography, Government and Principles of Accounts

title: CHEMISTRY
de_requirements:
ND with Upper Credit in any Chemistry related programme.

A' Level/IJMB with at least grade 'C' in Chemistry and Physics
utme_requirements: Five (5) credits in English Language, Mathematics, Physic, Chemistry and either Biology or Agricultural Science
subjects: Physic, Chemistry and (Biology or Mathematics)

title: CIVIL ENGINEERING
de_requirements:
ND with Upper Credit in Civil Engineering

IJMB or GCE A ‘Level with at least 9 points in Mathematics, Physics and Chemistry. HND in Civil Engineering with Upper Credit can be considered for 300 level
utme_requirements: Five (5) credits in English, Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry and any other subject from Additional Mathematics/Further Mathematics, Tech Drawing, Biology,  Geography, Basic Electricity/Basic Electronics and Agricultural Science
subjects: English Language, Mathematics, Physics and Chemistry

title: COMPUTER SCIENCE
de_requirements: (i) Two (2) 'A' Level passes with at least grade 'C' in Mathematics and Physics. (ii) ND with Upper Credit in Computer Science.
utme_requirements: Five (5) credits in English, Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry and any other subject from Computer Studies, Additional Mathematics/Further Mathematics, Tech Drawing, Biology, Geography, Basic Electricity/Basic Electronics and Agricultural Science
subjects: English Language, Mathematics, Physics and any other subject from Computer Studies, Chemistry, Geography, Biology, Agric Science and Economics.

title: CYBER SECURITY
de_requirements: (i) Two (2) 'A' Level passes with at least grade 'C' in Mathematics and Physics. (ii) ND with Upper Credit in Computer Science.
utme_requirements: Five (5) credits in English, Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry and any other subject from Computer Studies, Additional Mathematics/Further Mathematics, Tech Drawing, Biology, Geography, Basic Electricity/Basic Electronics and Agricultural Science
subjects: English Language, Mathematics, Physics and any other subject from Computer Studies, Chemistry, Geography, Biology, Agric Science and Economics.

title: ECONOMICS
de_requirements:
A' Level/IJMB with 9 points from Economics and any other two social science subjects.

ND with Upper Credit in any social and management sciences programme.
utme_requirements: Five (5) credits in English Language, Mathematics, Economics and any other two (2) subjects from Government, Commerce, Accounting, Geography, Agricultural Science, CRS/IRS, Further Mathematics and physics
subjects: Mathematics, Economics and any other subject from Government, Commerce, Accounting, Geography, Agricultural Science and physics

title: ELECTRICAL/ELECTRONICS ENGINEERING TECHNOLOGY
de_requirements:
ND with Upper Credit in any related Engineering Programme.

HND with Upper Credit may be considered for 300 level

A' Level/IJMB with 9 Points in Mathematics, Physics and Chemistry
utme_requirements: Five (5) credits in English, Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry and any other subject from Additional Mathematics/Further Mathematics, Tech Drawing, Biology, Geography, Basic Electricity/Basic Electronics and Agricultural Science
subjects: English Language, Mathematics, Physics and Chemistry

title: INFORMATION & COMMUNICATION TECHNOLOGY
de_requirements:
ND with Upper Credit in Electrical/Electronics Engineering
IJMB/GCE A ‘Level with at least 9 points in Mathematics, Physics and Chemistry
utme_requirements: Five (5) credits in English Language, Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry and any other relevant science subject from Additional Mathematics/Further Mathematics, Tech Drawing, Biology, Geography, Basic Electricity/Basic Electronics and Agricultural Science
subjects: English Language, Mathematics, Physics and Chemistry

title: INTERNATIONAL RELATIONS
de_requirements: IJMB with at least 9 points from Government, Economics and (Sociology or Geography)
utme_requirements: Five (5) credits in English Language, Mathematics, Government /History, CRS or IRS, Economics and Civic Education
subjects: Government or History, Economics and Literature in English, CRS or IRS

title: MARKETING
de_requirements:
ND with Upper Credit in Business Administration and Management, Accounting, Banking and Finance, Cooperative Economics and Management and Marketing.

GCE A’ Level/IJMB: Min 10 points in relevant subjects.
utme_requirements: Five (5) credits in English Language, Mathematics, Economics and any other two (2) subjects from Commerce, Accounting, Book Method/ Book Keeping and Marketing
subjects: Mathematics, Economics and any other subject from Commerce, Geography, Government and Principles of Accounts

title: MATHEMATICS
de_requirements: Candidates with two passes (graded A-C) at the GCE/IJMB. A’Level in relevant subjects (Physics and Mathematics and Further Mathematics)
utme_requirements: Five (5) credits in English, Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry and any other subject from Additional Mathematics/Further Mathematics, Tech Drawing, Biology, Geography, Basic Electricity/Basic Electronics and Agricultural Science
subjects: Mathematics, Physics any other subject from Biology, Chemistry, Agricultural Science, Economics and Geography

de_requirements:
ND with Upper Credit in any relevant engineering programme

A' Level/IJMB with at least grade 'C' in Mathematics, Physics and Chemistry

HND with Upper Credit in any relevant engineering programme may be considered for 300 level
utme_requirements: Five (5) credits in English, Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry and any other subject from Additional Mathematics/Further Mathematics, Tech Drawing, Biology,  Geography, Basic Electricity/Basic Electronics and Agricultural Science
subjects: English Language, Mathematics, Physics and Chemistry.

title: MECHATRONICS ENGINEERING
de_requirements:
A' Level GCE/IJMB with at least 10 points in Mathematics, Physics and Chemistry.

ND with Upper Credit in any relevant engineering programme.

HND with Upper Credit in any relevant engineering programme may be considered for 300 level
utme_requirements: Five (5) credits in English, Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry and any other subject from Additional Mathematics/Further Mathematics, Tech Drawing, Biology, Geography, Basic Electricity/Basic Electronics and Agricultural Science
subjects: English Language, Mathematics, Chemistry and Physics.

title: METALLURGICAL & MATERIALS ENGINEERING

title: PHYSICS WITH ELECTRONICS
de_requirements:
GCE A Level with at least grade B in Mathematics and Physics.

At least 9 points from Mathematics, Physics and any other science subject in IJMB. At least an Upper Credit in HND/ND Mechanical Engineering, Electrical/Electronics Engineering, Photogrammetry or Science Laboratory Technology with options in Physics or Electronics
utme_requirements:
Five (5) credits in
English, Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry and any other subject from Additional Mathematics/Further Mathematics, Tech Drawing, Biology, Geography, Basic Electricity/Basic Electronics and Agricultural Science

title: STATISTICS

Candidates with two passes (graded A-C) at the GCE/IJMB.A ‘Level in Mathematics and Physics

ND with upper credit in Statistics and any other related programme

title: TELECOMMUNICATION ENGINEERING
